dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The Alma-Arasan tourist route is closing for a full month starting June 3rd.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Alma-Arasan tourist route is closing for a full month starting June third.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Access to the popular Alma-Arasan tourist route in Almaty will be temporarily restricted from June 3 to July 3, 2025, due to ongoing reconstruction works, according to the city akimat (local government administration).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, the reconstruction work. That's a huge chunk of the summer hiking season.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, the reconstruction work. That's a huge chunk of the summer hiking season.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, from the parking lot all the way up to the thermal spring is totally off-limits.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, from the parking lot all the way up to the thermal spring is totally off-limits.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The closure will affect the section from the parking lot to the thermal spring, as well as the trail leading to the Devichi Slyozy (Maiden's Tears) waterfall and Terra meadow"destinations beloved by both tourists and locals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And that includes the trail to Devichi Slyozy waterfall and Terra meadow, which is a real bummer for locals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And that includes the trail to Devichi Slyozy waterfall and Terra meadow, which is a real bummer for locals.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The closure will affect the section from the parking lot to the thermal spring, as well as the trail leading to the Devichi Slyozy (Maiden's Tears) waterfall and Terra meadow"destinations beloved by both tourists and locals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's part of the second stage of this big renovation project they're doing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's part of the second stage of this big renovation project they're doing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Almaty's akimat, this is part of the second stage of a major renovation project.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: What exactly are they doing in phase two? Like, uh, replacing bridges and stuff?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What exactly are they doing in phase two? Like, uh, replacing bridges and stuff?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, dismantling old bridges, building new trail sections, putting in staircases… it's a major infrastructure upgrade.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, dismantling old bridges, building new trail sections, putting in staircases... it's a major infrastructure upgrade.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The second phase includes dismantling and replacing old bridges, constructing new trail sections, and installing staircases and other infrastructure, the akimat reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I remember phase one was back in May—rockfall clearing and anchor supports, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I remember phase one was back in May-rockfall clearing and anchor supports, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The first phase, which began on May 12, involved clearing rockfall hazards, installing anchor supports, and reinforcing parts of the trail.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And this closure is total, like, no access at all, even on weekends or holidays.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And this closure is total, like, no access at all, even on weekends or holidays.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The route will remain completely closed throughout the entire reconstruction period, regardless of weekdays, weekends, or public holidays. The trail will be fully closed for the duration of the work, including on holidays.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They're aiming to finish by July 31st, but weather could delay things a bit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're aiming to finish by July thirty first, but weather could delay things a bit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Completion is scheduled for July 31, 2025, the statement said. However, authorities warned that weather conditions could slightly affect the timeline.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So hikers really need to find alternate routes for the next month or so.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So hikers really need to find alternate routes for the next month or so.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Hikers and tourists are advised to plan their trips accordingly and consider alternative routes during this period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Alma-Arasan is such a popular spot; it's gonna be missed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Alma-Arasan is such a popular spot; it's gonna be missed.
